description: Create, destroy, or modify plot items associated with a plot. If no plot name is specified, the current view is assumed. Plot items control what is visualized in the plot. Note: Plot item configuration keywords are extensive and not fully documented; use 'plot export datafile' to inspect syntax.

keywords.name: s
keywords.description: Plot name. If not specified, the current view is assumed.

keywords.name: create
keywords.description: Add a new plot item to the plot. See plot_items table for available item types.

keywords.name: delete
keywords.description: Destroy the ith plot item in the list. Note: this renumbers following items.

keywords.name: modify
keywords.description: Modify the existing plot item at the ith position in the list.

plot_items.label: Axes
plot_items.description: Cartesian axes representation for view orientation and location reference

plot_items.label: Factor of Safety
plot_items.description: Last calculated factor of safety, displayed in legend

plot_items.label: Fracture
plot_items.description: Fractures from Discrete Fracture Network system

plot_items.label: Gp Fixity
plot_items.description: Lines showing gridpoint fixity conditions and direction

plot_items.label: Particle Trace
plot_items.description: Path taken by particle trace records

plot_items.label: Scalebox
plot_items.description: Background 3D scale box for size reference

plot_items.label: Vectors
plot_items.description: Vectors of values at structural nodes

plot_items.label: Zone
plot_items.description: Surfaces of zones in the range

plot_items.label: Zone Group Surfaces
plot_items.description: Zone faces along group name boundaries

plot_items.label: Profile
plot_items.description: Profile of zone field values along a line

plot_items.label: Tensors
plot_items.description: Tensor values of zones (stress, strain-rate, etc.)

plot_items.label: Tracked Particles
plot_items.description: Paths from zone fluid particle tracking

plot_items.label: Water Table
plot_items.description: Water table used for pore pressures

examples.description: Add axes to the current plot
Add geometry visualization to the plot
Modify the second plot item's color

notes: Plot item keywords for configuration are extensive and not fully documented in commands
Use 'plot export datafile' to inspect actual syntax for complex configurations
Additional plot items can be added by plug-ins

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('plot item create <type>') - no direct Python SDK method
